turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a coffee from Starbuck.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it from the Lakeline location in Austin, TX.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. Would you like an iced or hot coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a hot coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a hazelnut latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. Would you like any extra shots?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, one extra shot please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. Would you like any other flavors added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. When would like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up at 2 pm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. How will you be paying?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will use my Starbucks App to pay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it. Your Hot Venti Hazelnut Latte will be ready for pickup at the Lakeline location at 2pm. Please pay with your app now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. I've paid for the drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Got it. Thank you for choosing Starbucks. Have a great day!
